description: Rejects a request to assign billing of the available capacity of a shared Capacity Reservation to your account. For more information, see Billing assignment for shared Amazon EC2 Capacity Reservations.

parameters.name: CapacityReservationId
parameters.description: The ID of the Capacity Reservation for which to reject the request.

nested_items.name: Return
nested_items.description: Returns true if the request succeeds; otherwise, it returns an error.
